ARCHAEOLOGIST.Definition: a person who dug in the ground to find and study old things from the past

TRIBESMEN.Definition: men who belonged to a small group or tribe

EXOTIC.Definition: strange or different, from a faraway place

FIRING SQUAD.Definition: a group of people who shot people as a punishment

TRAILER.Definition: a short video that shows what the film is about

TREKKING.Definition: walking a long way in nature

THROUGH.Definition: from one side to the other side

NARRATOR.Definition: the person who tells the story

SHY.Definition: quiet and not wanting to be noticed

RUBBINGS.Definition: copies made by firmly pressing paper over a surface with writing or shape

CURATORS.Definition: people who took care of things in the museum

THESIS.Definition: a long piece of writing written for a university degree

CRUSADER.Definition: a fighter or participant in the medieval Crusades (military expeditions undertaken by Christian powers in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries)

ARCHAEOLOGISTS.Definition: people who dug up and studied old things from the past

RIPPLE.Definition: a small wave or effect that spread

TRIBAL.Definition: related to a group of families or tribe

HOLIEST.Definition: most special or sacred in religion

GARRISONS.Definition: groups of soldiers who protected a place

BITTERLY.Definition: to an extreme or particularly harsh degree

UNITY.Definition: the state of being united or joined as a whole

TRIBES.Definition: small groups of families living together

SUSPICIOUS.Definition: thinking something is wrong or not right

ITCHY FEET.Definition: a strong desire to leave and to travel

ASSESS.Definition: look at it and decide about it

AMBITION.Definition: a strong wish to do something

SHEIKH.Definition: a leader of a tribe or community

STRONGHOLD.Definition: a place that was strongly defended

GARRISON.Definition: a group of soldiers guarding the place

TRIUMPHANT.Definition: feeling happy because of the win

DERAILING.Definition: causing them to go off track

IN DISGUISE.Definition: wearing clothes to hide who he was

CONSULTATION.Definition: the process of formally consulting or discussing

FLAG CARRIER.Definition: someone that showed what the group stood for

KNIGHTHOOD.Definition: the title of being called a knight

EXILE.Definition: being sent away from his home country

RESENTMENT.Definition: bad feelings from being treated unfairly

DARING.Definition: brave and ready to take risks

AMBIGUOUS.Definition: not clear or having more than one meaning

SUMS UP.Definition: tells the main idea in a few words
